Question & Options:
What themes are explored in the movie *District 9*?
Options:
A. A) Xenophobia
B. B) Unity among humans
C. C) Insect-like species
D. D) Conflict between species
Correct Answer: A) Xenophobia, B) Unity among humans, C) Insect-like species

Question & Options:
What themes are explored in the movie *District 9*?
Options:
A. A) Xenophobia
B. B) Unity among humans
C. C) Conflict with an insect-like species
D. D) All of the above
Correct Answer: A) Xenophobia, B) Unity among humans, C) Conflict with an insect-like species

Question & Options:
Which themes and elements are explored in the movie 'District 9'?
Options:
A. A) The presence of an insect-like species
B. B) The theme of xenophobia
C. C) The relocation of alien species
D. D) All of the above
